% Default LaTeX header for matlabfragPDF.m
% Written June 2012 by M.G.L. Roes (m.g.l.roes@tue.nl)
%
% This file can contain any desired latex preamble code
% There are only two required components:
%  - It should use the 'standalone' document class, which
%    crops the resulting PDF document to the figure
%    dimensions
%  - The 'pstool' package, which is required to incorporate
%    the figure generated by matlabfrag into a document
%
% The rest of the packages can be added, removed and
% substituted according to own preference.

\documentclass[10pt]{standalone}

\usepackage{psfrag}
\usepackage{graphicx}
\usepackage[dvips]{color}
\usepackage[cmex10]{amsmath}
\usepackage{amsfonts}
\usepackage{amssymb}
